notes: Seti Astro Stacking Suite (SASS)-Supports Debayering Fits/Camera Raw-Dark, Flat, and Image Calibration-Image Measurement, Registration, and Integration-Available Rejection algorithms: Weighted Windsorized Sigma Clipping, Kappa Sigma Clipping, Simple Average, Simple Median, Trimmed Mean, Extreme Studentized Deviate, Biweight Estimate, and Modified Z-Score Clipping-Drizzle and dropshink algorithms-Automated grouping based on filter, exposure, etc-Automated folder creation for aligned images, master images, and calibrated images
